title: Settings
info: On this page, you can easily manage your profile information and change localization settings. You can update personal information such as name, email address and password, as well as customize your preferred interface language. Here you will find all the tools you need to manage your settings easily and conveniently.

confirm.title: Email confirmation
confirm.info: A link has been sent to your e-mail. Please follow the link from the email to confirm your email address
